input.sentences: the couple took a vacation at the seaside .
there was a lot to do there .
of course | there was a beach close by .
they got their picture taken in front of the ocean .
then they visited other local attractions .
output.sentences: Our family went to our vacation home, which was next to the sea.
There were a lot of things to do here!
We were extremely close to the beach so we could enjoy the beautiful water.
We took pictures of us with the ocean in the background!
We also visited local attractions in the area.
